name: Dodge Fall
description:
Avoid heat seeking missiles, spinning blades and falling meteors, whilst using your spinning flamethrower to help!

Submitted for Weekly Game Jam - Week 107 with the theme "Don't Touch It!" at http://www.weeklygamejam.com.

Controls

Use the mouse to move the ball.

Left click to use your spinning flamethrower to destroy obstacles in your path. You have limited fuel but you can collect fuel tanks to refuel.

More enemies spawn the longer you stay alive so stay sharp!

Guide Missiles into comets and spikes to explode them.

The golden missile is five times stronger than the others and will destroy anything in its path.

Left click five times to smash out of ice.

Collect coins to reach a higher score.
